title: The Mobbing of Noah Carl: with Sam Gregson
description:
I speak with Cambridge alum Sam Gregson on the academic mobbing that resulted in the firing of Cambridge jr fellow Noah Carl.

Here is the latest Quillette article on the subject: https://quillette.com/2019/05/28/noah-carl-an-update-on-the-young-scholar-fired-by-a-cambridge-college-for-thoughtcrime/

Follow Sam on twitter @Sam_Gregson

Follow me here:twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
